item.title: Autodoc 支持者寻求在法兰克福上市，筹资最多 4.03 亿欧元
item.description: Autodoc SE 的所有者希望在今年迄今为止德国最大的首次股票销售中筹集高达 4.03 亿欧元（4.66 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Autodoc SE’s owners are looking to raise as much as €403 million ($466 million) in one of Germany’s largest initial share sales so far this year.】

item.title: 德国讨论建立国有战略储气库
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，德国正在研究是否应建立一个天然气战略储备库，即美国紧急石油储备的缩小版。【原文：Germany is examining whether it should create a strategic store of gas, a smaller version of America’s emergency oil reserve, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 中国甲醇价格飙升，因担心来自伊朗的货物
item.description: 由于担心以色列和伊朗之间的敌对行动会中断塑料原料的出口，中国的甲醇价格飙升。【原文：Methanol prices have surged in China on concern hostilities between Israel and Iran could disrupt exports of the plastics raw material.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，里夫斯考虑推翻非家庭继承税改革
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）正在考虑推翻对无国籍人士的海外资产征收遗产税的决定。【原文：Rachel Reeves is considering reversing a decision to charge inheritance tax on the overseas assets of non-doms, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 计划囤积黄金的央行比以往任何时候都多
item.description: 受黄金在危机时期的表现和抵御通胀的作用的吸引，世界各国中央银行计划在未来 12 个月内积累更多的黄金，这一比例创下了历史新高。【原文：A record share of the world’s central banks plans to accumulate more gold over the next 12 months, drawn by bullion’s performance during times of crisis and protection against inflation.】

item.title: 中东冲突使霍尔木兹海峡成为焦点，油轮运价飙升
item.description: 最近几天，由于以色列和伊朗之间的交火使得通过霍尔木兹海峡运输燃料的风险增加，从中东运载精炼石油产品的油轮费率飙升。【原文：Tanker rates for vessels carrying refined oil products from the Middle East have surged in recent days, as the exchange of fire between Israel and Iran makes hauling fuel through the Strait of Hormuz more risky.】

item.title: 对市场而言，以伊战争已经结束
item.description:
油价和全球经济面临的风险似乎有可能继续得到控制。【原文：

Risks to the oil price and global economy appear likely to stay contained.

】

item.title: 佛山海天扩大香港上市规模，融资 13 亿美元
item.description: 佛山海天调味食品股份有限公司（Foshan Haitian Flavouring & Food Co.【原文：Foshan Haitian Flavouring & Food Co. has raised HK$10.1 billion ($1.3 billion) after robust demand for its shares to be listed in Hong Kong allowed China’s biggest soy sauce maker to increase the deal size.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德：全球欧元走势需要果断行动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）呼吁决策者抓住时机，在唐纳德-特朗普的政策削弱了人们对美元的信心之际，提高欧元的全球地位。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde called on policymakers to seize the moment and increase the euro’s global profile as Donald Trump’s policies undermines confidence in the US dollar.】

item.title: 印度 MCX 交易所将于今年推出电力期货
item.description: 印度最大的商品交易所--印度多种商品交易所有限公司（Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd.）将于今年晚些时候推出电力期货。【原文：Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd., the nation’s largest commodities bourse, will introduce electricity futures later this year, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified as the information is still private.】

item.title: 中国放宽电池和废钢进口规定，助力绿色发展
item.description: 中国正在放宽废钢进口规定，此举将支持电池金属的回收利用，并有助于加快钢铁市场的绿色转型。【原文：China is relaxing import regulations on scrap, a move that will support recycling of battery metals and help speed the green transition in the steel market.】

item.title: Tinder 2016 年发布失败后在美国推出改版后的双人约会功能
item.description: Tinder 将在美国重新推出双人约会功能，对其在 2017 年因隐私问题和该选项是否针对一夫一妻制人群的模糊性而搁置的一个有争议的产品进行了改造。【原文：Tinder is bringing a double-dating feature back to the US, revamping a controversial product it shelved in 2017 over privacy concerns and ambiguity about whether the option was meant for monogamous people.】

item.title: 英国早该大兴土木了
item.description:
工党政府提高经济适用房支出的计划有可能在更广泛的经济利益方面收回成本。【原文：

The Labour government’s plan to boost spending on affordable homes has the potential to pay for itself in wider economic benefits.

】

item.title: 特朗普 "报复性 "征税促使 AMP 停止在美长期投资
item.description: 澳大利亚顶级资产管理公司之一冻结了在美国的新的长期投资，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策不确定性越来越大。【原文：One of Australia’s top asset managers has frozen new long-term investments in the US, citing mounting uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 伯南克改革后英格兰银行资金紧张
item.description: 几个世纪以来，英格兰银行一直是英国金融健康的守护者。现在，该央行正面临着自身预算紧缩的问题，因为它要修复破旧的 IT 基础设施、加大招聘力度，并根据本-伯南克（Ben Bernanke）的审查结果全面改革其预测方式。【原文：For centuries the Bank of England has been the guardian of Britain’s financial health. Now the central bank is facing a budget crunch of its own as it repairs dilapidated IT infrastructure, ramps up hiring and overhauls the way it makes forecasts in response to Ben Bernanke’s review.】

item.title: 需求担忧加剧，花旗下调目标，铁矿石跌幅扩大
item.description: 由于需求季节性放缓以及有迹象表明中国钢厂正在削减钢铁产量，铁矿石创下 9 月份以来的最低收盘价。【原文：Iron ore headed for the lowest close since September on a seasonal slowdown in demand and signs Chinese mills are curbing steel output.】

item.title: 日本央行计划放缓债券购买削减后，日本债券期货下跌
item.description: 日本央行维持利率稳定，并表示将从下一财年开始放慢缩减国债购买规模的步伐，日本国债期货随之下滑。【原文：Japanese bond futures slipped after the central bank held rates steady and said it would slow its tapering of government bond buying from the start of the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变，计划明年放缓缩减债券购买规模
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率不变，并公布了一项从明年起放缓退出债券市场的计划，这是在市场波动加剧后的一个谨慎信号。【原文：The Bank of Japan left its benchmark rate unchanged and unveiled a plan to slow its withdrawal from the bond market from next year in a sign of caution following heightened market volatility.】

item.title: 印度央行行长表示：如果通胀下行，印度央行或有宽松空间
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，如果通胀低于预期，印度央行可能有进一步放宽政策的空间。【原文：India’s central bank may have space for further policy easing if inflation undershoots its projections, according to Governor Sanjay Malhotra.】

item.title: 韩国股市大涨，市值突破 2 万亿美元
item.description: 在经历了三年的挫折之后，韩国股市市值重回 2 万亿美元大关，这是对企业改革和人工智能芯片交易的热情所带来的一系列牛市里程碑中的最新一个。【原文：South Korea’s stock market value has regained the $2 trillion mark after a three-year setback, the latest in a series of bullish milestones amid enthusiasm for corporate reforms and AI chip trades.】

item.title: Auterion 与台湾达成无人机软件协议
item.description: 台湾与美国防务技术公司 Auterion 达成了一项多年期协议，共同设计可遏制中国威胁的自动驾驶汽车。【原文：Taiwan has struck a multi-year deal with US-based defense technology company Auterion to engineer autonomous vehicles that could deter threats from China.】

item.title: 油价上涨，印度能源指数在关键水平挣扎
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 花旗银行因需求下滑和美联储减息而终止黄金涨势
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Gold is expected to sink back below $3,000 an ounce in the coming quarters as a record-setting rally runs out of steam, according to Citigroup Inc., calling time on one of the standout rallies in commodities.】

item.title: 新世界债券持有人收到美元票据利息付款
item.description: 据几位债券持有人称，新世界发展有限公司已支付了周一到期的美元票据利息，这为这家负债累累的香港建筑商在努力完成 875 亿港元（111 亿美元）贷款再融资交易时提供了一些喘息空间。【原文：New World Development Co. has paid interest due Monday on a dollar note, according to several bondholders, giving the indebted Hong Kong builder some breathing room as it works to complete an HK$87.5 billion ($11.1 billion) loan refinancing deal.】

item.title: 旅游业下滑导致泰国机场公司股票跌幅创亚洲之最
item.description: 科维德事件后，泰国的游客潮已经变成了涓涓细流，这让泰国机场公司（Airports of Thailand Pcl）更加担忧，因为该公司在没有全职首席执行官的情况下，正在努力应对免税销售额的萎缩。【原文：Thailand’s post-Covid flood of tourists has turned into more of a trickle, adding to concerns for Airports of Thailand Pcl as it grapples with shrinking duty-free sales without a full-time chief executive officer.】

item.title: OpenAI 与美国国防部签订 2 亿美元合同
item.description: OpenAI 赢得了一份价值 2 亿美元的试点项目合同，该项目旨在帮助美国国防部确定如何将人工智能用于一系列行政和安全任务。【原文：OpenAI has won a $200 million contract for a pilot program aimed at helping the US Defense Department determine how it could use artificial intelligence for a range of administrative and security tasks.】

item.title: 高盛称中国住房需求将比峰值低 75
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：China’s demand for new homes in cities is expected to stay at 75% below its 2017 peak in the coming years due to a shrinking population and expectations of price declines that have been hurting investment interest, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 巴西国会威胁再次打击卢拉财政计划
item.description: 在国会推动阻止对部分金融交易增税生效之后，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）支撑巴西预算的努力濒临再次受挫的边缘。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s efforts to shore up Brazil’s budget are on the brink of another setback after Congress advanced a push to block tax increases on some financial transactions from taking effect.】

item.title: KKR 收购澳大利亚离网电力专家 Zenith Energy
item.description: KKR & Co. 已同意从 Pacific Equity Partners Pty Ltd.、OPSEU Pension Trust 和 Foresight Group Holdings Ltd. 等集团手中收购总部位于珀斯的离网电力系统供应商 Zenith Energy。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to buy Zenith Energy, a Perth-based provider of off-grid power systems, from a group including Pacific Equity Partners Pty Ltd., OPSEU Pension Trust and Foresight Group Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 特朗普德黑兰警告引发避险买盘，黄金走高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普呼吁立即撤离德黑兰之后，黄金在亚洲早盘交易中走高，投资者追踪以色列和伊朗之间的敌对行动，从而提振了避险需求。【原文：Gold pushed higher in early Asia trading after US President Donald Trump called for the immediate evacuation of Tehran, boosting demand for havens as investors track hostilities between Israel and Iran.】
